items.title: How to get running logloss in Tensorflow
items.body: I am training a model batch by batch. The training goal is to minimize the batch log loss. When I test the model, batches are used as well. For accuracy and AUC, I can use tf.metrics.auc and tf.matrics.accuracy to get running accuracy and AUC. However, how can I get running logloss for the test data?
